amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to implement the Treaty on Open Skies, done at Helsinki March 24, 1992, and entered into force January 1, 2002.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to implement the Treaty on Open Skies, done at Helsinki March 24, 1992, and entered into force January 1, 2002.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rogers (AL) amendment (A057) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rogers (AL) amendment (A057) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A057) offered by Mr. Rogers (AL).
